meanings: (자격·재능·자질 등을) possess, be equipped (to do), (선천적으로) be endowed with
실용회화-애정표현 Kiss me by the book.

vlive.korean: 그렇죠 약간 다 갖춰서! That's right! Sort of with everything! 듣기 View video DAY6 : 제1회 밥성진배 사생데회🎨
vlive.english: That's right! Sort of with everything!

vlive.korean: 그러면 대열 갖춰서. - 알겠어요. Then get in formation. - Okay. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [REPLAY] VICTORY ep.5 레드벨벳 작전타임! (Red Velvet's Timeout!)
좀 더 예의를 갖춰서 맞이해 주자고. let's greet him more formally. 듣기 View video PeekaVoo! : [Full]MYTEEN's FAN MEETING LIVE - 마이틴의 팬미팅라이브!

examples.korean: It is time to put these arrangements on a slightly more formal basis. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이런 준비들을 조금 더 의례를 갖춰서 할 때가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is time to put these arrangements on a slightly more formal basis. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Although I still go to him for advice, he would always say that I can take care of any problem because I have the skills now to handle it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아직도 조언을 받으려고 제 상사를 찾긴 하지만 그 분은 제가 이제는 능력을 갖춰서 어떤 문제든 잘 풀어나갈 거라고 항상 말씀하시곤 합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Although I still go to him for advice, he would always say that I can take care of any problem because I have the skills now to handle it. Add to Wordbook
